overview: Jared, a struggling writer, is haunted by a tragic past. Fact and fiction explosively collide when he writes of a dark family secret that his wife can't understand and that his mother has vowed to keep hidden at all costs. This gripping psycho-drama is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat! Featuring star performances from Faye Dunaway, Sean Young and Tony Goldwyn
tagline: She won't forgive. He can't forget.
title: Ghosts Never Sleep
